sentence.Network_en: In this weather the cliff face was a foggy drop into infinity.
sentence.Network_cn: 在这种天气条件下,雾蒙蒙的悬崖隐入广漠无限之中.

sentence.Network_en: It is impossible to count up to infinity.
Theoretically, a line can extend into infinity.
sentence.Network_cn: 从理论上来说直线可以无限地延伸.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French infinite or Latin infinitas, from infinitus (see infinite)

encyclopedia.content: infinity infinity（燕飞利仕）美国音响品牌销量排行榜前三之一！ 概述 INFINITY，中文译燕飞利仕，少数经常看港台音响杂志的发烧友就会知道这是美国一个音箱的牌号，但是很少有人知道燕飞利仕居然是美国的几大名牌之一，而且在1993年成为美国总统使用的音箱。如果你听了它播放弦乐时的清新甜美的声音，你会自然地认为面前音箱是英国制造的，直到交响乐的宏伟气势和广阔的音场再现在你的面前，你才会发现这是“MADE IN USA”。在

entry.def: Infinity is a number that is larger than any other number and can never be given an exact value.

example.tran: 这些排列可以增加到无穷大。

example.ex: There is always an infinity of numbers between any two numbers.
example.tran: 任何两个数字之间都存在无穷多的数字。

entry.def: Infinity is a point that is further away than any other point and can never be reached.

example.ex: ...the darkness of a starless night stretching to infinity.
example.tran: 没有星星的夜晚，黑暗无边无际

auth_sentence.content: There's an infinity pool set around tropical trees.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: There's an infinity pool set around tropical trees.

auth_sentence.content: 'T have your infinity without a God damned universe!

auth_sentence.content: However it does not go to infinity like fractals.

sentences.en: It is impossible to count up to infinity.
